auth/invalid-email.message: The email address is not valid.

auth/user-disabled.message: The user account has been disabled.

auth/user-not-found.message: There is no user record corresponding to this identifier.

auth/email-already-in-use.message: The email address is already in use by another account.

auth/weak-password.message: The password must be at least 6 characters long.

auth/too-many-requests.message: Too many unsuccessful login attempts. Please try again later.
